lookupOrCreatePrivateFamily

public static ChannelFamily lookupOrCreatePrivateFamily(Org orgIn)
Checks that an org has a channel family associated with it. If not, creates the org's channel family.

Parameters:
orgIn - the org to verify
Returns:
the ChannelFamily found or created

Lookup the List of ChannelFamily objects that are labled starting with the passed in label param
